name: Last Comments Without Links
author: Sinan Ä°ÅžLER

sections.description:
This plugin does default wordpress widget but without links. It is only shows name and comment.

Features

This plugin add last comments widget your widgets area.
Different is; default last comments widget have commenter URL but this widget show only name and last comment text.
It cant show url or author web address.

WordPress Tema

Arbitrary section

None
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Now you can use widget on widgets section.
sections.faq:
How can I use this plugin

This plug is add a widget on widgets zone.

Is there a settings page

Other then widget there is no setting or function page. It is very simple

and powerfull plugin.

Tell me something I dont know

If you are using this plugin you are very good man !
